title: How to complete physics and chemistry in one month if I've not started studying yet - Quora

response.answer_text: People have already gave you tips. But to follow those tips is on you. But question is why would someone who hasn't studied will study now ,not one hour neither two,but more than twelve hours of study? Why would you? There has to be reason . That's all you need. A REASON. Do you wish to do something in the field of academics? Then study is the only option for you. If you find start still, you're just waiting your time in existing. Just go and study, and don't stop until you are done.

1. First read your class notes. Class notes are often treasure for students because teachers gives the notes in the most comprehensible way and since you have attended the classes you can easily understand and keep them in mind. 2. NCERT books can be easily understandable. So read the book chapter by chapter. 3. Get a good sleep of at least 6-7 hours. It will help you to keep you cool in the exam hall next day and you will be able to recollect this. 4. You can pick 3-4 most important chapters for that subject based on marks distribution in previous year's question papers.Make sure you read them completely from the main textbook like NCERT book. 5. For chapters with less weightage, focus more on going through notes prepared by you or someone else. REVISION is the Key… Whatever you learn, keep revising them regularly. Many students complain that they forget learned topics after few days. It is a common problem. With regular revision you can overcome it. Try to solve sample paper at least once a week to feel confident about your preparation. Solve last 10-year question papers. First, prepare those chapters in which you feel comfortable.

Don't forget you have 1 month remains so focus on that. Now close all your Social media account for a month. Study Minimum 6–7 hour daily fix time for both physics and chemistry.Carry notes form your friend and start theory first complete all theory then start numerical as well as revision and always make a daily chart for Study that what topic you have to do tomorrow and just do that. All the best \U0001f44d you can do that and don't doubt on yourself.
Its a tough job but still achievable.Make a good time table and give responsibility to your elders to see that you follow it sincerely otherwise you also know that you will not follow.

It is possible to cover all the important concepts only we have a precise focus in the subject. Follow the below strategies it will definitely help you. cover basic conceptsDerivations important in physics concentrate on those areas.In chemistry equations are important have a look over it.After covering all the important concepts. Refer the previous question papers. In that thoroughly study the repeated questions.This definition fetches you a good score in your exams

If u cannot feel science than u will not be able to understand it. First of all do not rush for sake of just passing the exam. Go through the basic understanding of concepts. Watch video lectures that will help u to feel it and will give u better understanding of concepts.

The answer depends on the extent to which you want to master physics and chemistry. If you are considering taking any competitive examinations in the recent future, I would say that your goal is Herculean. But, if this is for any high school test, then sure, start right now, and you have a fair chance.
follow abhishek dhar sir in your answers for this question.
